name: Matsuu
tagline: We are a creative mobile and web digital studio
description:
Matsuu is an end-to-end mobile design and development studio with an operations office in NYC, US and R&D in Gdansk, Poland. We help companies develop digital strategies that deliver on the core strategy, delight customers and enable them to operate smarter and faster. 
Our Process.
Brainstorm - requirement analysis, project estimation
Agile Planning & Design - sprint planning, design document, and prototype
Development - sprint execution, demo and feedback
Deployment - production, technical support
Launch - app store submission, marketing
Maintenance and Support - versioning, enhancements, scaling
 
What we do best.
Digital Strategy Consulting. We create bold ideas and transform them into real business opportunities that bring value to your customers. We help you see beyond the obvious.
Mobile App & Web Development. Our app developers craft beautiful native apps the way that makes them truly outstanding performing across the platforms. 
Advanced Back-End Solutions. Cutting-edge customized solutions for demanding clients that make your mobile app stand alone and shine. 
User Experience Design. Brand and business goals require a deep understanding of user needs, product business drivers, platforms’ requirements and best usability practice.
Prototyping & Analytics. Our interactive prototypes test assumptions of design while analytics to provide measurements of app’s performance. 
Let’s build the next big thing. Together.
